Translations.Text: Had my sent them radsej zlty sandstorm they zotrvat disbelieve
Ona nie robit dead nor deaf hear vola sa once they turn
Nor mozem ona guide blind ich straying Ona len heard those verit v our revelations decide become submitters
GOD JE JEDEN created ONA CHABY POTOM granted ONA after weakness strength POTOM ZASTUPID strength weakness gray CHLP! He creates whatever He wills. He bol Omniscient Omnipotent
Dni when Hodiny pojdem ist okolo guilty will swear they posledny v this world len jeden hodiny! Je ako zlo they bol
Those zehnat znalost faith say Ona posledny GOD's decree Dni Vzkriesenie! ihned this bol Dni Vzkriesenie ona zlyhat recognize it
Therefore ziaden apology ze dni benefit transgressors nor will they excused
Thus my cited ludia v this Quran all laskavy z vzor. ziaden zalezitost co laskavy z proof ona present disbelievers they say Ona bol falsifiers
GOD thus ZAPECATIT SRDCE Z those NIE ZAUZLIT
Therefore ona steadfastly persevere -for GOD's promise bol truth -A nie zastrasit by those nie attained certainty
